The following information was obtained from maneger of a city water department for predicting the consumption of water(in gallons)from the size household:
```{r}
x=c(2,7,9,4,12,6,9,3,3,2);x
y=c(650,1200,1300,430,1400,900,1800,640,793,925)
#########(1)###########3
plot(x,y)
##########2)###########
cor(x,y)
cor.test(x,y,method="pearson")
#############(3)###################
Model_1=glm(y~x,family=gaussian);Model_1
###########(4)#############
summary(Model_1)
############(5)#################
anova(Model_1)
P_value=pf(14.58,1,8,lower.tail =F)
P_value
###########(6)############
abline(Model_1)
############(7)########
confint(Model_1,level=0.95)
############(8)##########
predict.lm(Model_1,data.frame(x=5),interval = "confidence")

```
